module: Module-level comment: The "eth_txethmac" module manages Ethernet MAC transmission processes including frame padding, CRC computation, and collision detection and handling. Using a combination of internal state machines ("eth_txstatem"), counters ("eth_txcounters"), and dedicated CRC computation ("eth_crc"), it orchestrates sending Ethernet frames while dynamically adjusting to network conditions and ensuring data integrity. This modular design together with a strategic mix of sequential and combinational logic ensures robust and efficient frame transmission over Ethernet.
